intro.title: A NEW PORTFOLIO
text: It is a period of career transition. A brave developer, striking from a hidden base, has won their first victory against the evil Galactic Empire of boring resumes.
During the battle, Rebel spies managed to steal secret plans to the Empire’s ultimate weapon, the DEATH STAR, an armored space station with enough power to destroy an entire planet.
Pursued by the Empire’s sinister agents, Princess Leia races home aboard her starship, custodian of the stolen plans that can save her people and restore freedom to the galaxy....

about.name: Akash
about.title: 3D & Full-Stack Developer
about.description: A passionate developer with a love for creating immersive 3D experiences and robust web applications. I turn ideas into reality with code, from the final frontier of space to the user's screen.

projects.title: Project Alpha
projects.description: An interactive 3D model viewer for e-commerce, built with React and Three.js.

projects.title: Project Beta
projects.description: A data visualization dashboard using D3.js and React to display complex datasets in an intuitive way.

projects.title: Project Gamma
projects.description: A real-time multiplayer game built with Node.js, Socket.io, and Three.js.
